description: A couple of meters of spider-silk, woven in a way that closely resembles cotton. If cut down to size, it could easily be used as a subsitute for a thrifty tailor.
A couple of meters of spider-silk, woven in a way that closely resembles nylon. If cut down to size, it could easily be used as a subsitute for a modern tailor.
A couple of meters of dense spider-silk, woven in a way that closely resembles soft Kevlar. If cut down to size, it could easily be used as a subsitute for an armor tailor.
